sentences.en: A prankster dropped thousands of colored plastic balls down the Spanish Steps in Rome last week.
sentences.cn: 上周,一名恶作剧的人从罗马的西班牙台阶倾倒了无数颗彩色塑胶小球.

sentences.en: But he also felt that ultimately the whole of reality seemed to be constructed as if by some great cosmic prankster.
sentences.cn: 但是他也觉得最终一切的现实看上去似乎只是一个爱开玩笑的造物主构造出来的而已。

sentences.en: Now, the search is unmask the mystery prankster.
sentences.cn: 现在人们正试图找出神秘马面人到底是谁.

sentences.en: The 70 - year - old shares traits of both utilitarian and prankster.
sentences.cn: 这位70 岁 的发明家集实用与搞怪于一身.

sentences.en: Whatever the trick, if the innocent victim falls for the joke the prankster yells, April Fool!
sentences.cn: 不管是什么样的招数, 只要那个无辜的受害者中技了,恶作剧的人就会尖叫:“愚人! ”

words.tran_cn: 爱开玩笑的人；顽皮的人；恶作剧的人

trans.tran_cn: 顽皮的人，爱开玩笑的人
trans.tran_en: someone who plays tricks on people to make them look silly
